label: DHSZWDMPL01
info_overview:
The product is equipped with energy consumption monitor and can work with compatibile controllers and software to display the current  electricity usage on the connected circuit.  Can be used with compatible universal remote controllers, control panels, gateways, PC with Z-wave USB dongle or manually via external round button.

♦ Dim and control On/Off control of home lighting and appliance circuits
♦ No wiring, plugs into standard wall sockets
♦ Optimised antenna range for indoor use, up to 20m
♦ 50W to 500W 240V for resistive load lamps
♦ Z-Wave RF frequency 921.42MHz (Aus/NZ)
♦ Z-wave and manual operations
♦ Integrates with all certified AUS/NZ Z-Wave controllers
♦ Small form factor that can be easily hidden away
♦ Z-Wave energy monitor (working only with compatible controllers / software)
category_description: Small devices to be plugged into a power socket in a wall which stick there
errors: At least one device manual must be uploaded as PDF
